SELECT wms_check.*, wms_warehouse.warehouse_name as warehouseName FROM wms_check left join wms_warehouse on wms_warehouse.id = wms_check.warehouse_id WHERE 1=1
AND wms_check.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND wms_warehouse.id = #{warehouseId}
AND wms_check.check_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.checkCode},'%')
AND wms_check.check_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.checkTime},'%')
AND wms_check.profit_lost LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.profitLost},'%')
AND wms_check.check_note LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.checkNote},'%')
AND wms_check.transaction_by LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.transactionBy},'%')
AND wms_check.originator_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.originatorId},'%')
AND wms_check.field1 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.field1},'%')
AND wms_check.field2 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.field2},'%')
order by wms_check.check_time DESC

SELECT wms_check_sku.*, t_sku_product.sku_name as skuName, t_sku_product.bar_code as skuBarcode, t_sku_product.sku_code as skuCode, t_sku_product.field1 as skuUnit, wms_warehouse.warehouse_name as warehouseName, CASE WHEN wms_check.`status` = 'Draft' THEN ( SELECT wms_inventory.valid_sku FROM wms_inventory WHERE wms_inventory.sku_id = wms_check_sku.sku_id AND wms_inventory.warehouse_id = wms_warehouse.id ) ELSE wms_check_sku.deserved_quantities END AS deservedQuantities FROM wms_check_sku left join t_sku_product on t_sku_product.id = wms_check_sku.sku_id left join wms_warehouse on wms_warehouse.id = wms_check_sku.warehouse_id left join wms_check on wms_check.id = wms_check_sku.check_id WHERE 1=1 and wms_check.id =#{checkId}
